title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added a known issue warning for GitHub Enterprise Server 3.16 and 3.17 about potential performance degradation under high-scale operations.
Symptoms include slow response times, background job queue spikes, elevated CPU usage, and increased MySQL load.
Advises caution when upgrading near capacity limits.
summary:
- Added a known issue warning for GitHub Enterprise Server 3.16 and 3.17 about potential performance degradation under high-scale operations.
- Symptoms include slow response times, background job queue spikes, elevated CPU usage, and increased MySQL load.
- Advises caution when upgrading near capacity limits.
generated_title: Add performance degradation warning to GHES 3.16 & 3.17 release notes
commits: **5330434**: Updating release notes for 3.16 and 3.17 with a known issue. (#56817) (by Pallavi)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:

- Advises caution when upgrading near capacity limits.
